---
title: "comp_list"
---
<br>
```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "> "
)
```

```{r setup}
library(saferTool)
```
<br>

### Datasets

```{r}
list1 <- list(a = 1:5, b = LETTERS[1:2], d = matrix(1:6)) # 2D list
list2 <- list(1:5, LETTERS[1:2]) # 2D list
list3 <- list(a = 1:5, b = LETTERS[1:2]) # 2D list
list4 <- list(LETTERS[5:9], matrix(1:6), 1:5) # 2D list
```
<br>

### Datasets info

```{r}
list1 # 2D list
list2 # 2D list
list3 # 2D list
list4 # 2D list
```
<br>

### Argument safer_check
```{r}
comp_list(data1 = list1, data2 = list3, safer_check = TRUE) # safer_check = TRUE, checkings are performed before main code running
```
<br>

### All the arguments
```{r}
comp_list(list1, list2, safer_check = TRUE)

comp_list(list1, list3, safer_check = TRUE)

comp_list(list2, list4, safer_check = TRUE)
```
